TITLE: Custom Glass Effect with SwiftGlass in SwiftUI
DESCRIPTION: Example showing how to apply a customized glass effect to a VStack containing text and an image, with parameters for radius, color, material, gradient opacity, shadow color, and shadow radius.
SOURCE: https://github.com/1998code/swiftglass/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: swift
CODE:
```
VStack {
    Text("Custom Glass")
    Image(systemName: "sparkles")
}
.padding(30)
.glass(
    radius: 20,
    color: .blue,
    material: .regularMaterial,
    gradientOpacity: 0.7,
    shadowColor: .blue,
    shadowRadius: 10
)
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Basic Usage of SwiftGlass in SwiftUI
DESCRIPTION: Simple example demonstrating how to import SwiftGlass and apply the default glass effect to a text view in SwiftUI.
SOURCE: https://github.com/1998code/swiftglass/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: swift
CODE:
```
import SwiftUI
import SwiftGlass

struct ContentView: View {
    var body: some View {
        Text("Hello, Glass!")
            .padding(40)
            .glass() // Use default glass effect
    }
}
```

TITLE: Customizing Glass Effect in SwiftUI
DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows how to apply a customized glass effect to a VStack containing text and an image. It demonstrates various customization options such as radius, color, material, and shadow properties.
SOURCE: https://github.com/1998code/swiftglass/blob/main/README/README_ko.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: swift
CODE:
```
VStack {
    Text("커스텀 유리")
    Image(systemName: "sparkles")
}
.padding(30)
.glass(
    radius: 20,
    color: .blue,
    material: .regularMaterial,
    gradientOpacity: 0.7,
    shadowColor: .blue,
    shadowRadius: 10
)
```

TITLE: Applying Basic Glass Effect in SwiftUI
DESCRIPTION: This code demonstrates how to apply the default glass effect to a Text view in SwiftUI using the SwiftGlass package. It imports the necessary modules and uses the .glass() modifier.
SOURCE: https://github.com/1998code/swiftglass/blob/main/README/README_ko.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: swift
CODE:
```
import SwiftUI
import SwiftGlass

struct ContentView: View {
    var body: some View {
        Text("안녕, 유리!")
            .padding(40)
            .glass() // 기본 유리 효과 사용
    }
```

TITLE: Installing SwiftGlass via Swift Package Manager
DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows how to add SwiftGlass as a dependency in a Swift package. It specifies the package URL and version requirement.
SOURCE: https://github.com/1998code/swiftglass/blob/main/README/README_ko.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: swift
CODE:
```
dependencies: [
    .package(url: "https://github.com/1998code/SwiftGlass.git", from: "1.0.0")
]
```

TITLE: Cloning and Setting Up SwiftGlass Repository
DESCRIPTION: Commands for forking, cloning the SwiftGlass repository locally, and setting up the upstream remote for synchronization with the main project.
SOURCE: https://github.com/1998code/swiftglass/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
git clone https://github.com/YOUR-USERNAME/swiftglass.git
cd swiftglass
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Updating Fork with Latest Changes from SwiftGlass Main Repository
DESCRIPTION: Commands to fetch and merge the latest changes from the upstream repository to keep your fork up-to-date.
SOURCE: https://github.com/1998code/swiftglass/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-22_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
git fetch upstream
git merge upstream/main
```

SOURCE: https://github.com/1998code/swiftglass/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
git remote add upstream https://github.com/1998code/swiftglass.git
```
